mapper.insert: insert into asset( serialnumber, asset_state, reg_date, model, category_code ) values( #{serialnumber}, #{assetState}, current_timestamp(), #{model}, #{categoryCode} )
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.serialnumber as serialnumber, a.asset_state as assetState, a.reg_date as regDate, a.model as model, a.category_code as categoryCode, ac.category_name as categoryName from asset a inner join asset_category ac on ac.category_code = a.category_code order by a.reg_date desc

select a.id as id, a.serialnumber as serialnumber, a.asset_state as assetState, a.reg_date as regDate, a.model as model, a.category_code as categoryCode, ac.category_name as categoryName from asset a inner join asset_category ac on ac.category_code = a.category_code where a.id = #{id} order by a.reg_date desc
mapper.update: update asset set serialnumber = #{serialnumber}, asset_state = #{assetState}, model = #{model}, category_code = #{categoryCode} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.serialnumber as serialnumber, a.asset_state as assetState, a.reg_date as regDate, a.model as model, ac.category_name as categoryName from asset a inner join asset_category ac on a.category_code = ac.category_code;
